title: Investigate Unauthorized Device on Network
description: The security system detects an unknown device connected to a corporate network port. The agent must investigate.

tasks.description: Acknowledge the alert and identify the switch port the device is connected to.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent identifies the specific switch and port from the alert.

tasks.description: Remotely disable the switch port to disconnect the device from the network.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully shuts down the port.

tasks.description: Create a security incident report and assign it to the physical security team to investigate the location.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent creates a detailed security report for further investigation.
